attributes.action: sack Gordon Brown and appoint Frank Field as your successor
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We don't want to be governed by a Scot. This will be divisive and will build up resentment and subversion in England possibly leading to the break up of the United Kingdom.

Besides, Gordon Brown is hardly Prime Minister material.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
